titles.title: He's My King; O How I Love Him

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He is the King of kings,
He is the Lord of lords,
His name is Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, Jesus,
Oh, oh, oh, oh! He is the King!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He's my King, and oh how I love Him;
He's my King, and there is none above Him.
All day long you can hear me singing,
Glory hallelujah, He's my King.
